title: main tO nahi
sahitya:
main tO nahi jAvun janani jamunA kE tO tIr


caraNam 1    itni sukE mAt jasOdA pUchti murahar sE kyO nahi jAvat dhEn carAvan bAlak kah ham sE
    caraNam 2    kahat hari sab gvAlin mil ham minjat ghan kuch sE jab sab lAjbharI brajvAsin kahE na kahO drg sE
    caraNam 3    taubhI kahat sabE madhusUdan bOlat jasumati sE jab tab gOpin sab hari kE mukh DhAnkat nij kar sE
    caraNam 4    aisi lIlA kOTi kiyO kaisE jAyO madhuvan sE padmanAbh prabhu din udhAraN pAlO dukh sE
